title: Dün Gece Bir Rüya Gördüm
overview: Deniz is a young, confused, and lovesick computer engineer. He has left his small town and come to Istanbul, where he lives according to his own set of rules. The woman he loves, Lale, is a troubled young woman with a drug addiction. At the end of a night that could be a dream or reality, they wake up together. The fact that he is lying next to the woman he has dreamed of and loves truly astonishes him. The film tells the story of one of those lives that have been completely transformed in an unexpected way, changed by love. Is Deniz caught in a dream he never wants to wake up from, or is he right in the middle of reality?
